name: Sunflower Salad
author: Ksysha
summary: This eye-catching Russian layered chicken and mushroom salad is perfect for any party or buffet. The salad is decorated to look like a sunflower, hence the name.
ingredients: 3  hard-boiled eggs, yolks and whites separated and grated
1 (4.25 ounce) can pitted black olives, drained
directions: Place chicken legs into a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until no longer pink at the bone, 15 to 20 minutes
Shred chicken meat and season with salt
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Cook and stir onion until soft, about 5 minutes
Add mushrooms and cook until soft, 5 to 8 minutes
Mix mayonnaise and garlic together in a bowl
Mix 1/4 cup of the mayonnaise with the chicken
Spread chicken-mayonnaise mixture in the shape of a disk on a serving plate
Cover with onion-mushroom mixture and 1/4 cup of mayonnaise
Add grated egg whites and 1/4 cup of mayonnaise
Sprinkle Cheddar cheese on top; cover with remaining mayonnaise
Sprinkle grated egg yolks evenly over the top
Cut olives into 4 wedges each and place on top to resemble sunflower seeds
Place potato chips around the salad to resemble sunflower petals
